review: I purchased the Fire TV Stick for my mom last winter as a Christmas Gift and have loved using it when we visit.  When I saw it on sale for Prime Day, I had to grab one for our house!  I love how easy it was to set up and the ability to have HBO Go, Netflix and YouTube (as well as Prime Video).  I do wish the home screen could be customized a bit but all in all, it's fantastic!
author: Jenny

review: It's over all good and handy to use and set up. But I would really love to have the function of connecting wireless headphone through bluetooth, just like Fire TV box.
author: Huiyao

review: I am very pleased with the Fire TV Stick.  It was extremely easy to set up and always connects to the internet quickly and streams videos well. The games are a nice plus and the portability is a wonderful feature.  I have already recommended it to a friend who also purchased one.
author: CaddyH "True Dreamer"

review: This thing has absolutely no range. Even with a WiFi signal of good, it constantly buffers and disconnects. All of the apps need to be re-authenticated once a week. Not worth the aggravation.
